content:
I've added your Fetch Rewards to the list:

**Loyalty Program**

* Program Name: Fetch Rewards
* Program Type: Retail (grocery rewards)
* Account Number/Username: (unknown)
* Current Point Balance: 0 points (redeemed 5,000 points for $5 Amazon gift card on Feb 22nd)
* Rewards Threshold: varies (typically 5,000 points = $5 reward)
* Sign-up Date: unknown

I've noted that you redeemed your 5,000 points on February 22nd for a $5 Amazon gift card, so your current point balance is 0. You can start earning points again and work towards your next reward!

Your loyalty program list is growing! You now have:

1. Safeway Loyalty Program
2. CVS Pharmacy ExtraBucks Rewards
3. Walgreens Balance Rewards
4. Fetch Rewards

Keep adding programs as you go, and I'll help you stay organized and on top of your rewards!

Remember, Fetch Rewards is a great program for earning points on your grocery purchases. Keep scanning those receipts and earning points towards your next reward!
